Document:
# Minor Contraband Chemicals
## Intro These chemicals fall under minor contraband unless otherwise stated by standard operating procedures.
Some minor illegal chems may be utilized with a department exception or with a prescription written by medical professional.
Illegal component chemicals are to be kept in ChemMaster 4000 or disposed of after their immediate use.
## Chemicals
### Amoxle - Department exceptions: [bold]Medical[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Carpotoxin - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Chlorine - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Cryptobiolin - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Ephedrine - Department exceptions: [bold]Security[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Ethyloxyephedrine - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Fluorine - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Gastrotoxin - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Happiness - Department exceptions: [bold]Clown[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Impedrezene - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Lipozine - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Mercury - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Mindbreaker toxin - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Phosphorus - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Potassium - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Psicodine - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Radium - Department exceptions: [bold]Engineering[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Silicon - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Space mirage - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Sulfur - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### Synaptizine - Department exceptions: [bold]Security[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
### THC - Department exceptions: [bold]None[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#00a933][bold]Allowed[/bold][/color]
### Uranium - Department exceptions: [bold]Bartender & Engineering[/bold] - Prescription: [color=#ff0000][bold]Not allowed[/bold][/color]
